```
mysql> `SELECT name, abbrev FROM states ORDER BY name;`

| name           | abbrev |
+----------------+--------+
| Alabama        | AL     |
| Alaska         | AK     |
| Arizona        | AZ     |
…
| West Virginia  | WV     |
| Wisconsin      | WI     |
| Wyoming        | WY     |
+----------------+--------+
```
